page.title: 01Shilton and Withybrook area
page.content: The area is very largely farming land .The farms are mainly cereal crop farms and mixed farms with dairy herds , sheep or pigs.{Shilton}is in the middle of a group of four small villages {-Ansty ,Barnacle , {Withybrook}and{Shilton. It provides the only school and only Post Office of the area.Most peple work in the{Coventry}area,but there is much unemployment .There is only one bus service,which goes from {Nuneaton}to{Coventry},so most people need private transport. According to the{1981}census returns { 847}people lived in{Shilton}and{232 in{Withybrook.} The population has remained steady over the years,until a new{Rugby {Council}estate was built in{Shilton.
